Entries.Sewer_Mon: Humans are fascinating to observe, but I must be careful to stay hidden.
Entries.Sewer_Tue: I am too sensitive to sunlight to go out on most days.#$b#The conditions in here are perfect.#$e#Care to buy anything?
Entries.Sewer_Wed: I find things here and I sell them. Care to buy anything?
Entries.Sewer_Thu: Please don't tell anyone about me.#$b#Humans tend to destroy things they can't understand.
Entries.Sewer_Sat: On Fridays I stay silent as a sign of devotion to Yoba.
Entries.Sewer_Sun: ...Sorry, I'm still a little wary of humans. My shop is still open to you, however.
Entries.Sewer_Mon2: Back again? I suppose it does fit into my theory of human behavior.
Entries.Sewer_Tue2: The smell? ...Ah, I see. My sense of smell is rather weak compared to a human's, so the particular miasma of the sewer does not trouble me.#$e#Many culinary delicacies of the shadow are highly aromatic. I am particularly fond of void egg concoctions.#$h
Entries.Sewer_Summer11: I would be most interested in your description of the human 'luau.' Unfortunately, the sun is too bright for me to observe it directly.
